comment._content: Fella on the left looks like a fine gentleman

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Doesn't look old enough to be the father of the fella on the right, though.

comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content:
Man in top hat: "You're gonna go beat off those Yankees who want to take away my slaves, aren't you, son?"

Young soldier (thinking to self): "Good Lord, what have I gotten myself into?"

comment.author: 79492347@N05
comment._content: If you don't know the name of the soldier, how do you know that's his "father." Also, a simple look reveals that both are approximately the same age and the man on the right is likely not the father of the soldier!

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Shamrock Centurion:  The seller provided the title information for this image, but you're right, we don't know for sure.  We'll add the phrase "possibly the soldier's father" to the description next time we update.

comment.author: 38352585@N03
comment._content: There's no way to tell if they're the same age from such an old picture, of course it could be his father, or his brother or something.
